Description:
Notice No 311813138, IN served re failure to ensure that exposure to a substance hazardous to health, namely metal working fluid, is prevented or, where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled

Notice No 311813179, IN served re failure to provide suitable health surveillance for employees who are, or are liable to be, exposed to substances hazardous to health, namely metalworking fluid, which can cause occupational dermatitis and lung disease

Notice No 311813194, IN served re failure to ensure that exposure to metalworking fluid on the Mazak vertical machining centre machine is prevented, or where this is not reasonably practicable, adequately controlled
